title: cmd/gc: crash on struct with field _ interface{}
body:
by **atulsvasu**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
Please help me here, I can't include proprietary code, but I am willing to disclose
privately.

Rough steps: Modified thrift4go to include go v1 nuances, and got it working with most
of the .thrift files, but failed on one of them miserably. 

$ go build thriftlib/rule

What is the expected output?
Compiles

What do you see instead?
src/thriftlib/rule/RuleService.go:1: internal compiler error: fault

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
go from mercurial, and latest downloaded binary. 

Which operating system are you using?
Linux R9-HEX23 3.0.0-19-generic #33-Ubuntu SMP Thu Apr 19 19:05:14 UTC 2012 x86_64
x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version go1.0.1

Please provide any additional information below.
Contact me for more details.
